title: Raiz Rewards: New Brands on the Block – Earn Rewards Up to 4.9%!
description: Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu 27/01/2023   Raiz Rewards: New Brands on the Block – Earn Rewards Up to 4.9%!   Welcoming our 3 new brand partners on Raiz Rewards: Tiqets, Guess, and Club21! Get cash bonus (or cashback) while you shop using “Raiz Rewards”! Your cashback will get invested into your Raiz account automatically.
body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Copy-of-RR-H01-900-×-506-px-3.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-3-jenama-baruuu-dapatkan-bonus-tunai-sehingga-4-9/)__

__27/01/2023__

__Raiz Rewards: New Brands on the Block – Earn Rewards Up to 4.9%!__

Welcoming our 3 new brand partners on Raiz Rewards: __Tiqets, Guess,__ and __Club21!__

Get cash bonus (or cashback) while you shop using “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)”! Your cashback will get invested into your Raiz account automatically.

Just go to “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “[__Shop Online Here__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” button. We’ll direct you to the brand’s app or website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback\*.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

__Tiqets__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/blog-size-900-x-506px-43.png)

__(+4.9% invested)__

__Tiqets__ is an online booking platform for museums and attractions that connects travellers worldwide with more ways to experience culture.

Book online now with __Tiqets__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.90%__ cash bonus of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Guess__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/blog-size-900-x-506px-42.png)__

__(+4.2% invested)__

__Guess__ designs, markets, distributes, and licenses a lifestyle collection of contemporary apparel, denim, handbags, watches, eyewear, footwear, and other related consumer products.

Shop online now with __Guess__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.2%__ cash bonus of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Club21__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/blog-size-900-x-506px-41.png)__

__(+4.2% invested)__

__Club21__ is a leader in the luxury fashion market managing over 30 brands and operating more than 200 stores worldwide.

Shop online now with __Club21__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.2%__ cash bonus of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

[![raiz rewards](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Explore-Raiz-Rewards.gif)](https://ye77.adj.st/raiz_rewards?adj_t=lwt55og_doqwx9i&adj_deep_link=raiz-my%3A%2F[%E2%80%A6]iz_rewards&adj_fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Frewards)

raiz rewards

__Need more details?__

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards [__here__](https://raiz.com.my/my-support/)

Get RM10 bonuWant to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp [__here.__](https://app.adjust.com/4vnqz2h_q39miv7?fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Fregistration)
